snippet: Harold Reynolds has worked for ESPN and MLB Network. Tom Verducci has served as a senior writer at Sports Illustrated and a field reporter for TBS.
abstract: Fox Sports announces that 72-year-old lead baseball analyst Tim McCarver will be replaced by Harold Reynolds and Tom Verducci.
lead_paragraph: Harold Reynolds has worked for ESPN and MLB Network. Tom Verducci has served as a senior writer at Sports Illustrated and a field reporter for TBS.

headline.main: Reynolds and Verducci to Fill McCarver’s Spot as Lead Baseball Analysts on Fox
headline.print_headline: McCarver’s Spot as Fox’s Lead Analyst to Be Filled by Reynolds and Verducci
